article.title: Beam Search Strategies for Neural Machine Translation

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the relationship between beam size and average fan out per sentence as shown in Figure 1?
choices: As beam size increases, average fan out per sentence decreases.
As beam size increases, average fan out per sentence increases.
Beam size and average fan out per sentence are not related.
Average fan out per sentence remains constant regardless of beam size.

multiple_choice_question.text: In Figure 2, what happens to the BLEU score when the relative pruning threshold is increased beyond 0.6?
choices: The figure does not provide information about BLEU score changes beyond a threshold of 0.6.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does Formula (1) describe in the context of the paper?
choices: Calculation of BLEU score for a candidate translation.
A method for calculating the total score of a candidate translation.
A criterion for discarding candidate translations based on their relative score compared to the best candidate.
A method for normalizing candidate translation scores.

multiple_choice_question.text: According to Table 1, which pruning technique achieves the highest decoding speed improvement for a beam size of 14  without degrading the BLEU score on newstest2014?
